overview: You have been together with your new girlfriend Megane for like a month now. She was born in France and her English requires taste, but you manage to communicate what you want from each other. She is one fun girl... and she's into a lot of naughty stuff. And yet, there are a lot of things you still don't know about her. Since she prefers an open relationship, maybe she will let you fuck your hot and beautiful secretary, Romy as well. Get to know her better and discover her sexual desires and fantasies today!
title: Infidelity Allowed
